background.attachment_info: [Specifies background image is fixed or scrolls with page](https://w3schools.com/cssref/pr_background-attachment.asp)
background.title: Title Background

font.height_info: Space between text lines. Default is set to 1.3

customer-note.name: Dear Customers!
customer-note.note: If you are facing a problem with installation, creating navigation, or configuring our theme, please read our [documentation online](http://adornthemes.com/documentation/avon). Or feel free to create a support ticket from the [support page](https://www.adornthemes.com/support/). We will help you as soon as possible. We have tried our best to make our theme easy to use and customise. Thank you for choosing AdornThemes and being our customer! We appreciate it.

space.title: Space between sections ====
space.info: You can select default or small from each individual sections

heading.title: Sections Heading =====
heading.style_info: Style 4 & 5 Not avaialble for left align text.

general_settings.name: General Settings
general_settings.rtl_info: Text Direction will be right to left
general_settings.catalog_mode_info: Hide cart and add to cart buttons

wishList.title: WishList ====
wishList.page_info: First create page and select template page.wishlist

keywords.title: Popular Keywords ======
keywords.info: Display suggestion words below text field
keywords.label: Label
Keywords
keywords.info: Add words separated by comma. I.e. Jeans, Dress, Top, Summer...

image.label: Image
image.info: Upload image: png, ico, Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

retina_image.label: Retina Image
retina_image.info: Upload image: png, ico, Will be scaled down to 152 x 152px

author.label: Author Name
author.info: Enter Author name for your shop

tab_title.title: Dynamic Browser Tab Title ====
tab_title.info: Changing browser title dynamically when user leave tab

free_shipping.title: Free Shipping Message ====
free_shipping.info: Add new product for free shipping with a minimum amount.

message.label: Free Shipping Message
message.info: Use the '$' sign to show price in the message.

fonts_colors.name: Fonts, Colors and Styles
fonts_colors.guide: [Guide - class name for further development and use](https://avon-demo.myshopify.com/pages/typography)

fonts.title: Fonts =====
fonts.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store.

navigation.title: Navigation ======
navigation.border_info: when navigation is displayed below logo(optional)

links.background_info: Color apply to main links background in MM Advanced

mobile.title: Mobile Navigation =======
mobile.sub_links_info: if background is dark, Select lighten else darken

top.title: Top Header ====
top.icon_info: For icons use code like . [Find icons here](http://www.adornthemes.com/optimal-icons/). use shortcode [social-icons] to show social icons.
top.column_info:
Wrap text in

, or tags [Find icons from here](http://www.adornthemes.com/optimal-icons/)

main.title: Main Header ====

logo.width_info: Set Maximum width in pixels, min-width:50, max-width:500
logo.width_mobile_info: Set maximum width in pixels, min-width:50, max-width:150

main.height_info: Set maximum height in pixels, min-height:40, max-height:220
main.mobile_height_info: Set Maximum height in pixels, min-height:40, max-height:100
main.navigation_below_text_info: Display text on left OR center when navigation is displayed below the logo.
main.navigation_info: Configure Navigation from sections --> Main Navigation

transparent.title: Transparent Header ===
transparent.info: enable transparent header on home page only. This style will not work when navigation is displayed below logo
transparent.logo_info: show different logo for transparent header(optional)

image.heading: Grid Images ====
image.size_info: Images will get cropped in full size option when products have different image size.

swatch.heading: Color Swatches ====
swatch.type_info: Some colors appear white? Add custom colors from 'Custom Colors' section which appear below footer section

labels.heading: Product Labels ====
labels.show_sale_info: Compare price must be greater than sale price to show label
labels.sold_out_info: Label will show when item inventory is 0
labels.info: Same label name add as a tag to related products

product_page.heading: Product Page
product_page.image_height_info: Set maximum height for product images when you have different size images or need to show small size image

siechart.heading: Size Chart ===
siechart.sizelink_info: Show link above the size swatch that, when clicked, will open a popup displaying the size chart.
siechart.variant_names: Add variant option name you want to show size chart
siechart.variant_info: Eg: Size, Dimension, Taille, Velikost, talla, Taglia

variants.heading: Variant Options =====
variants.type_info: Custom color name should be predefined in 'Custom Colors' section.
variants.color_swatch: Add variant option name you want to show color swatches
variants.color_swatch_info: Eg: Color, couleur, Farbe, Kleur, Farge
variants.square_style: Keep size or other Variant style in square only?

checout_button.heading: Dynamic Checkout Button ====
checout_button.info: Lets customers checkout directly using a familiar payment method. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

currency.heading: Currency Conversion ====
currency.shopify: 1) Shopify: This feature is only available for stores using Shopify Payments. First Check [list of supported countries](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/payments/shopify-payments/shopify-payments-requirements#can-I-use-shopify-payments)
currency.shopify_info: Your customers can pay for their orders and receive refunds in their local currency. [Enabling multiple currencies](https://help.shopify.com/manual/payments/multi-currency/setup).
currency.adornthemes: 2) AdornThemes: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency. You need to [edit your store's currency formatting](https://www.adornthemes.com/knowledge-base/multiple-currencies-setup/).
currency.title: Title text
currency.code_info: show currecny code with product price
currency.supported_currencies_info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

language.heading: Language ====
language.weglot_info: [Install weglot app to use weglot translate on your store](https://dashboard.weglot.com/register?fp_ref=adornthemes)
language.flag_info: [Download flag zip file](https://www.adornthemes.com/documentation/vogal/flags.zip), then  Upload flag SVG file from Admin -> Content --> Files)
language.title: Title text

newsletter.heading: Newsletter
newsletter.custom_info: If you are using third party app for newsletter then add form code here
newsletter.image_info: Style 1: maximum width: 500px. Style 2: width:400px, height:550px. Style 3: width: 500px.

account.whatsapp_info: Add your number with country code. Ie. your number is 3456789715 and country code +39 then add number 393456789715

all.name: Section ====
all.head: Heading
all.column_width_info: Total width of all blocks in a row must not be more than 100%.

blog.name: Blog Page

banner.name: Banner ======
banner.info: Use metafield option to show banner image in pages. [How to set this?](https://www.adornthemes.com/knowledge-base/create-metafield-for-page-banner/)
banner.title: Title ======

blog.number_of_post: Number of Post to Show per page
blog.title: Post Title ====
blog.author: Show Author?

cart.name: Cart Page
cart.notes_info: Use [shop.currency] for default currency and [selected.currency] for adtivated currency on store.
cart.country_info: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the  spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.

shipping.name: Shipping Message
shipping.free_ship_info: Manage from theme settings > General Settings > Free Shipping Message

collections.text_left_padding_info: Enable this if you want to display text on left and transparent background as displayed in Jewellery demo

block.name: Collection
block.link_info: Keep it empty to use 'collection url'.

list_page.name: Collections List Page
list_page.source_info: All collections are listed by default. To customize your list, choose 'Selected' and add collections.
list_page.Short_by_info: Sorting only applies when 'All' is selected

banner.name: Collection Banner ======
banner.image_info: Insert dynamic source to show different image for each collection. [How to set?](https://www.adornthemes.com/knowledge-base/set-collection-banners-by-metafields/)
banner.title: Collection Title ======
banner.description_info: Insert dynamic source to show different description. [How to set?](https://www.adornthemes.com/knowledge-base/set-collection-banners-by-metafields/)

sidebar.name: Sidebar & Filters
sidebar.position_info: Only filter blocks show while select Popup Box option.
sidebar.info: Change title and links look from Theme Settings -> Fonts, Colors and Style -> Collection & Blog Sidebar

dynamic_filters.name: Dynamic Filters
dynamic_filters.app_info: Customize filters with the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters).
dynamic_filters.tags_info: This options will not work  with tag base filters. Either choose dynamic filters OR filters by tags.[How to set?](https://www.adornthemes.com/documentation/avone/#ProductFiltersNew)
dynamic_filters.two_columns: Add filter title names that need to show in two columns.

tags_filter.name: Filter By Tags
tags_filter.info: This options will not work  with dynamic product filters. You can choose either dynamic filters OR product filters using tags. [How to set?](https://www.adornthemes.com/documentation/avone/#ProductFilters)
tags_filter.title_info: i.e 'Filter by Size, Filter by Brands'
tags_filter.add_tag_info: Separate by a comma, i.e "Tag1, Tag2, Tag3".
tags_filter.add_color_info: Separate by a comma, i.e "Black, Red, Blue". Filters will not work untill you don't assign the same TAG NAME to relavant products.  Custom color name should be predefined in 'Custom Colors' section.

contact.google_map_info: [Guide to Embed map](https://support.google.com/maps/answer/144361?co=GENIE.Platform%3DDesktop&hl=en#). In the iframe code, set width = '100%' and height as needed.

video_section.name: Video
video_section.video_info: Supported file type .mp4, .mov. - video will play in loop
video_section.mobile_video_info: Optional. If you have different video for mobile view
video_section.autoplay_info: Autoplay will not work with sound
video_section.text_position_info: Text position work only in large screen
video_section.hide_text_info: Hide button or text due to the limited space on mobile

exit_intent.name: Exit Intent Popup
exit_intent.button_info: display button to view collection page

footer_section.name: Footer
footer_section.payment_image_info: Use image instead of Payment icons
footer_section.container_width_info: The combined width of all blocks must not exceed 100%

instagram.name: Instagram
instagram.note: Note: Instagram will not work at 2 place at the same time. Either you can display in section or footer
instagram.api_key_info: Add Instagram Access Token Key here. [How to get Instagram Access Token?](https://insta-app.etssoft.net/docs/how-to-get-instagram-access-token)

hero.name: Parallax Banner
hero.parallax_info: Only applies to desktop. For Parallax Effect Recommanded Image Size 2000x1000 px.
hero.image_info: For Best Resolution recommended image width 2000px and height should be as per your above selections.
hero.mobile_image_info: Recommended width 750px and height as per above mobile height. If mobile image is blank, dekstop image will be used.
hero.link_on_image_info: This option will add link on entire image instead of only button
hero.countdown_info: Please click save button to view
hero.date_info: Date Formate should be Month/Day/Year. i.e 12/25/2024

blocks.desktop_img_info: Recommended width 2000px and height as per section height if custom height is selected.
blocks.mobile_img_info: Recommended width 800px and height as per section height if custom height is selected. If mobile image is blank, desktop image will be shown.
blocks.column_img_info: Recommended size: 700x900. Use the same size image in all slides.

instagram.name: Instagram
instagram.api_info: Add Instagram Access Token Key here. [How to get Instagram Access Token?](https://www.adornthemes.com/knowledge-base/how-to-get-instagram-access-token/)

map.name: Map
map.map_address_info: Google maps will find the exact location
map.api_key_info: You’ll need to [register a Google Maps API Key](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/map-section-api-key) to display the map

blocks.filter_info: Filter icons will display on collection page

navigation.name: Main Navigation
navigation.change_style: Change fonts size and colors from Theme Settings --> Fonts, Colors and Styles --> Navigation
navigation.grid_view_info: Grid view supporting two level navigation only.
navigation.container_width_info: Set inner content width max to layout width

login.name: Login Link
login.info: You can add store login  here Or you can display store login with top right icon
login.account_info: You need to select 'Accounts are optional' from Store Settings --> Checkout

simple.name: MM Simple
simple.position_info: You can show images at right or bottom of links
simple.column_width_info: Option work when images show right of links

links_image.name: MM Links with Image
links_image.image_info: Upload images for each menu link. The image name must be the same as the link name, and no spaces should be used. Example: Women Clothing = women-clothing.jpg Upload images at 'Store admin > Content > Files.

custom.name: MM Custom HTML
custom.info: This link block show in desktop only. It will not come in mobiles.

dropdown.name: Dropdown Menu
dropdown.info: This link block show in desktop only. It will not come in mobiles.

newsletter.name: Newsletter
newsletter.info: Any customers who sign up will have an account created for them in Shopify. [View customers](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

page_sec.name: Page
page_sec.hide_header_footer_info: You can use this option when creating a landing page without a header or footer.
page_sec.page_banner_info: Use metafield option to show banner image in pages. [How to set this?](https://www.adornthemes.com/knowledge-base/create-metafield-for-page-banner/)

password_page.name: Password Page
password_page.newsletter_info: [Tell your visitors about a launch day discount](https://www.shopify.com/blog/15514000-14-ways-to-use-offers-coupons-discounts-and-deals-to-drive-revenue-and-customer-loyalty)

block.name: Image
block.link_info: Link is apply only to text

products_slider.name: Products Slider
products_slider.button_info: Button to access the collection page

blocks.review_info: Display Reviews from app. Choose app from General Settings -> Products Reviews
blocks.other_app: Add other app reviews snippet here
blocks.sizechart_info: Set content for size chart from Theme Settings -> Product Page -> Size Chart Type
blocks.metafield_info: [How to set different data for each products?](https://www.adornthemes.com/knowledge-base/vogal-display-different-tab-details-for-each-product/)

products.info: Manage some global product options from Theme Settings -> Product Page

blocks.divider_info: You can also use this block to add more space between 2 blocks
blocks.title: Product Title

price.name: Price
price.discount_badge_info: Display right after price if product have discount
price.tax_info: Show tax and shipping information label?

vendor.name: Vendor/Brand
vendor.logo_info: Need to create png logo image with same name as vendor name and upload at settings > files. Example: Coca Cola = coca-cola.png, Nike = nike.png
vendor.discount_badge_info: Display right after price if product have discount
vendor.tax_info: Show tax and shipping information label?

description.name: Product Description
description.read_more_info: Keep it blank if you do not want to show read more link below short description

variants.name: Variant Options
variants.info: Manage swatch style from Theme Settings-> Product Page

wishlist_and_links.name: Wishlist & Popup Links
wishlist_and_links.enquiry_info: Open Popup and send email direct to ask about product
wishlist_and_links.delivery_returns_info: Below shipping page content will appear in a popup

buy_button.name: Quantity & Buy Button
buy_button.gift_recipient_info: Allows buyers to send gift cards on a scheduled date along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

rating_availability_sku.name: Rating/Availability/SKU
rating_availability_sku.review_info: Display Ratings from app. Choose app from General Settings -> Products Reviews

collapsible_tab.name: Collapsible Tab
collapsible_tab.info: Manage color and fonts from theme settings > product page > Collapsible Tab

quantity_message.name: Quantity Message
quantity_message.max_info: Display stock left number when product stock is less than selected numbers

custom_option.name: Custom Option
custom_option.info: Custom Options are used to collect customization information for an item added to the cart. [Guidelines](https://www.adornthemes.com/knowledge-base/vogal-how-to-add-product-custom-option)
custom_option.field_info: IMPORTANT: Upload file do not support dynamic checkout button. This extra field will not show up in the quick shop and quick view popup.
custom_option.label: Field Label
custom_option.field_options: Options if using radio buttons, drop-down select or checkbox group
custom_option.required_info: If you select this, the checkbox need to be checked or text should be add in text field to add the item to the cart.
custom_option.show_at_checkout_info: Uncheck this if you don't want the information to be shown in the cart or checkout page with order details.
custom_option.visibility_info: How you want to display custom option for products
custom_option.visibility_select: If visibility is set By Type or By Tags
custom_option.visibility_select_info: Separate Product Types/Tags name with a comma.
custom_option.by_product: If visibility is set By Product
custom_option.by_metafield: If visibility is set By metafield
custom_option.by_metafield_info: Create True or false metafield and copy full key name and add here. Key name should look like this {{ product.metafields.custom.your_name }}

fake_order.name: Fake Order
fake_order.message_info: Use '[orders]' for items counts and '[hours]' for hours counts

shipping_estimate.name: Shipping Estimate
shipping_estimate.info: Display same time for all products, To set different for each product [follow this article](https://www.adornthemes.com/knowledge-base/show-shipping-estimated-time-for-specific-product-2/)
shipping_estimate.days_info: Add value in days like 4/10 and customer will show date after 4 to 10 days from today date.
shipping_estimate.message_info: Use '[startdate]' and [enddate] for date to show with message

blocks.free_ship_info: Manage free shipping message from Theme Settings -> General Settings -> Free Shipping Message

liquid.name: HTML/Liquid
liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

complementary.name: Complementary products
complementary.info: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

more_colors.name: More Colors
more_colors.info: To select color products, add the metafields. [Learn more](https://www.adornthemes.com/knowledge-base/more-color-products/)

testimonials.name: Testimonials
testimonials.image_info: Style 1 & Style 2: recommended size 100x100. Style 3: recommended size 500x300
testimonials.author: Author

textline.name: Text Line
textline.text_info: Add text in <span> tags if you enable scrolling text
textline.scrolling_info: Hover effect will not work on touch device. If the text in the loop is too short, you must add the same text more than once to avoid loop break.

top_bar.name: Top Information Bar
top_bar.hide_info: Hide this section for mobile site
top_bar.marquee_info: We have used pure css for this effect so there will be little jerk once text line start to repeat in loop. hover effect will not work on touch device

before-after.name: Before / After Slider
before-after.image_info: Use same size images for below & after
